thoughts.text: Since the `list_files` command returned too much output, we should try a different command to get a better understanding of our current environment. Perhaps we can use the `execute_shell` command to run a simple command that will give us some basic information about our system.
thoughts.reasoning: By using the `execute_shell` command, we can run a simple command that will give us some basic information about our system. This will help us better understand our current environment and make more informed decisions about which commands to use next.
